title: iMac Late 2013 dont "see" the intern SSD
message:
Hi,

got this imac 21.5" with blinking "?" Folder

or is it more common for a bad SSD

title: iMac Late 2013 dont "see" the intern SSD
message: Start a installation process and check if  the drive is present on disk utilities...

title: iMac Late 2013 dont "see" the intern SSD
message: I booted with my extern ssd, the intern SSD is NOT to see in Disk utility

title: iMac Late 2013 dont "see" the intern SSD
message: Do you know if it is a SATA HD or a retina stile SSD??
